BugInstance.message: Potential code injection when using GroovyShell
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.util.groovy.expr.HotspotInlineExpressionParser.evaluate(String) checks a map with containsKey(), before using get()
org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.util.groovy.expr.HotspotInlineExpressionParser.flatten(List): 1st parameter 'segments' could be declared as java.lang.Iterable instead

Class org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.util.groovy.expr.HotspotInlineExpressionParser defines static field "org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.util.groovy.expr.HotspotInlineExpressionParser.SCRIPTS" which appears to allow memory bloat
This method org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.util.groovy.expr.HotspotInlineExpressionParser.split() parses a String that is a field
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.util.groovy.expr.HotspotInlineExpressionParser.evaluate(List) passes constant String of length 1 to character overridden method
